word_mean: 骨质疏松症：骨质异常疏松，最常见于老年人。根据骨的矿物脱失的程度，可伴有疼痛(特别是背下部)、畸形(如身高减低)，还可发生病理性骨折。可以是特发性的，或者继发于其他疾病(例如甲状腺毒症)
以慢性腰背疼痛，甚则畸形、骨折为主要表现的一种全身性骨量减少性疾病。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from osteo- 'bone' + Greek poros 'passage, pore' + -osis

entry.def: Osteoporosis is a condition in which your bones lose calcium and become more likely to break.

means.word_mean: 1. abnormal loss of bony tissue resulting in fragile porous bones attributable to a lack of calcium; most common in postmenopausal women
